Description: Our client is an ambitious and fast-growing FMCG products distribution, manufacturing and B2B ecommerce company that connects suppliers with retailers worldwide.As the Chief Marketing Officer, you will be the mastermind behind the company's marketing strategy and execution. Your ultimate goal will be driving exponential growth for private label snack brands.You will set the marketing visions for the company and lead online and offline marketing activities including social media content, trade marketing material, product campaigns across EMEA region.You will lead a team consisting of social media executives, marketing manager, trade marketing executive, graphic designers, content writers and will be responsible for marketing budget management.Skills
Skills: We are looking for 10+ years of experience in creating successful brands from scratch and driving brand growth preferably in the FMCG industry. In-depth knowledge of digital marketing tools, trends, and platforms, with an emphasis on data-driven decision-making.
